name: Our Communal Garden
description:
Made for Wholesome Jam 2022, Our Communal Garden is a calm puzzle game that learns as you go.

You play four neighbors who have never gardened before and they all have random things they want to try out.  Unfortunately, not every crop is good for every season.  But, as they find what works with the seasons, they'll make better choices in the years to come.

Programming by Maya Zimmerman

Art by Squid Poe Quo

Art by Ani Mei Kao

Music by Evan Carville

The game is currently incomplete.  There are short minigames planned to help the crops grow once they're planted and with a high enough score, I'd like us to throw an in-game party.  :D

As it is, shoot for a score of about 60.  If you can do that, you're doing pretty good.  Of course, feel free to just leave it open to vibe with the music if you like.

This jam was a blast and I'm so lucky to work with my team here at Easy Peazy Games. <3
